data.subTitle: Computer Science Engineer and Software QA specialist skilled in manual and automated testing, Python, and data analysis. Passionate about quality, automation, and emerging technologies, seeking to contribute and grow in QA/SDET roles.
aboutDescription: Computer Science Engineer with expertise in Software Quality Assurance, skilled in manual and automated testing, Python, and data analysis. Also holding a Diploma in Automotive Engineering, with strong interest in engine performance and emerging automotive technologies.
Strong understanding of software QA and testing life cycles, including manual testing, automation testing using Selenium, functional and regression testing, and black/white/grey-box methods.
Seeking opportunities to contribute and grow in software QA or automotive engineering, bringing technical depth and a quality-first mindset.

projects.description: Thesis analyzing the impact of extended gaming hours on academic performance and mental health among Bangladeshi undergraduate students using SPSS and SmartPLS.
Designed and implemented an online food ordering and delivery platform covering ordering, payment, and delivery flows.

projects.projectName: AI-Driven Counterfactual Analysis for Multiple Myeloma
projects.description: Developed an AI-driven counterfactual analysis system to improve predictive accuracy for Multiple Myeloma.
Implemented multi-class lymphoma classification using ensemble transfer learning models for medical imaging.
Built an AI chatbot for customer support using CNN-based NLP to enhance user interaction.

achievements: Assisted in designing, developing, and maintaining software applications under senior supervision.
Wrote, executed, and reviewed test cases to ensure functionality, performance, and reliability.
Performed manual and automated testing using Selenium and Jira; identified bugs and reported issues.
Debugged and troubleshot code issues, providing recommendations for improvements.
Supported version control and collaborative development using Git.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) in Computer Science and Engineering

certifications.name: Professional Certificate for SQA and Testing
The Complete Prompt Engineering for AI Bootcamp (2025)

data.contactParagraph: I am actively seeking opportunities in Software QA, automation, and SDET roles. Feel free to reach out for collaboration or hiring.
